Reviews.Title: Can't be WORST
Reviews.Author: GBM
Reviews.Content: This is my really first deception in the online shopping world, because I can't even turn on the phone, I connect the phone to the charger and nothing happens; I couldn't return the phone to the warranty because I'm out of the USA. In a few words I lost 143.98$ and I can't do anything.The seller "Vegabuy" sent me several emails asking me that I remove the negative feedback, and talk with them, so I remove the negative feedback and now they don't answer me my emails.SincerelyGiuseppe Bifaretti

Reviews.Title: "slickdeals4you"  Sidekick 3 (unlocked)
Reviews.Author: MS
Reviews.Content: I purchased this phone through Amazon.com from a company called "slickdeals4you". I have to say that I was a little concerned about "slickdeals4you" since they really did not have much of a website that I could find and the only contact was via a hotmail address.But since it was being ordered through Amazon I figured I'd be covered if there was a problem. As it turned out, the phone arrived right on time. It's a great phone if you do a lot of texting since it has the full qwerty keyboard. Call quality was fine. It's a fairly large, bulky phone though.However, after a few weeks it developed a problem with the screen. It would regularly display an unreadable, garbled mess. I contacted the seller via email and received a prompt response. In fact, I ended up emailing him several times over several days and he always responded quickly and politely.He advised me that I was within the 30 day return period and that I could return it for replacement, which I did. I received the replacement phone exactly 7 days (including weekends) from the day I shipped the defective phone to him. Very fast service.

Reviews.Title: Frustrated with buying this online :X
Reviews.Author: Rikhath
Reviews.Content: I bought this phone online and this damn thing doesn't work, its not charging, I tried to charge it on different plug points but it wouldn't work :(.I am a big fan of AMAZON.COM and do all my shopping here and this is the first time around i got a defective package :(.I have returned the Phone to the seller and i am waiting for a New piece or refund.Plus The box didn't have the standard accessories like Pouch, SD Card, Handsfree and the String to attach. :(Very unhappy about the product.Hope AMAZON helps me.

Reviews.Title: Mixed Feelings
Reviews.Author: Luella Carmona "Lusy"
Reviews.Content: I was so happy to get this phone because I could finally text with a key board. The swivel is nice as well. However, there is no alarm which I need daily.How does a cell phone not have an alarm???? It has no calculator. It does not record videos. I have a cell phone that I paid $30 for(the phone the sidekick is replacing) and it has all of the obvious features. Now I am going to have to keep my old cell phone plugged up so that I will have an alarm.

Reviews.Title: Not a great phone
Reviews.Author: Marwan Al Sarkal "Marwan"
Reviews.Content: I have received the phone on time, but i found out that it was locked, so i had to take to an expert to unlock it. Secondly, the reception is very bad, i rarely find a signal on the phone, which means i cant rely on it. I wont recommend this phone to anyone, because its a waste of money!!

Reviews.Title: Wrong
Reviews.Author: Zen Flux "Zen"
Reviews.Content: This is not an htc phone but made by sharp. Also the phone won't web browse using another mobile network.

Reviews.Title: this place sucks
Reviews.Author: Daniel Cruz Del Barco
Reviews.Content: I order a new unlocked smart phone and what i got was a complit scam the phones was not new was refurnish they just put new stickers on it, and wasen't unlocked, please do not buy at this store

Reviews.Title: Nice phone Nice price
Reviews.Author: Edward Hill
Reviews.Content: my sidekick was delivered very fast,everything works no problems. I will for sure do business with you guys again. Thank you

Reviews.Title: It's just ok...
Reviews.Author: Amanda
Reviews.Content: I bought this phone for my 13 year old son because he's always wanted a sidekick and this one was affordable.  A message pops up on the phone constantly saying that the back is not in place and he has to remove the battery cover and replace it. He also has to put the charger into the phone a specific way or it will not charge. He probably won't keep it long anyway and it suits his needs for now, but I wouldn't really recommend it.

Reviews.Title: too expenvie for poor techonology
Reviews.Author: panda123
Reviews.Content: i purchased this sidekick thinking that i could use it for a long time.this phone only lasted me for 3 months. This was something i did not expect.and this product is very expensive. i do not like it one bit.

Reviews.Title: Confused in California
Reviews.Author: eekitsaspider
Reviews.Content: I got this phone about a week ago and I have had to put my contact list in it 5 times now. I am about ready to throw it in the trash! If there is some special way to store my contacts on this phone and keep it saved I have clue how to do that. I will NEVER get this phone again!

Reviews.Title: Not the best phone
Reviews.Author: Connie
Reviews.Content: I bought this phone for my daughter back in August. At first she didn't have any problems with it, but after a month the screen started to glitch. Then a couple months later her battery died and she lost all her important stuff she had saved to her phone. And recently the charger won't work right if she moves it a little bit it stops charging. She doesn't get half of her text messages or they won't send and she has to shut the phone off and turn it back on. She said that the activation screen shows up on hers once a day. Also the scroll ball stopped working, sometimes when it works she has to push on it 6 or 7 times to click on something or it decides to move and click on something else. She has babied that phone and it's having all those problems. She also got tired of when she'd turn it off and then turn it back on she had to set the date and time. My daughter said the camera quality is terrible and this was the worst phone shes ever owned.

Reviews.Title: HORRIBLE
Reviews.Author: MATT
Reviews.Content: There are many things that make this phone a horrible and pointless purchase.one: The size of the phone is pretty ridiculious, its like carrying a brick in your pocket.two: the camera is aweful, you can't even see the pictures you take, and without a memory card you can only take 3 pictures.three: there are hardly any tools on this phone, only a calander, a to do list and notes.four: The settings are quite complicated and its hard to personalize it the way you want it.five: the power button is extremly sensitive and turns on all the time when its in your pocket.six: the battery life on this phone is pretty bad.

Reviews.Title: The selle contact me for solve my problem
Reviews.Author: Jefferson Lozargo
Reviews.Content: The seller of the cell phone contact me to solve my problem.I'm satified! Thanks.

Reviews.Author: jordanndruu
Reviews.Content: I bought this phone from a company in flordia, it arrived in 2 days it said should arrive in 10-17 days which i think was a bounus, also i charged the phone for a good hour or two when i first opened the package and it holds a pretty good charge it holds 1-2 days. But there was a few down sides of this phone, it doesnt come with a memory card, and even with a sim card if it powers off because the battery was taken out or it dies, i lose all my contacts the date and time go to like 1998 5:00 P.M., so then i have to import everything from simcard, and all the moemory cards and adapters out of 5 that i have tested do not work, so i would not recomend this phone, but yes it is okay

Reviews.Title: SIDEKICK 3
Reviews.Author: Billie Koehler
Reviews.Content: This is a great product for all the different user functions.The phone is great and I only wish that they would make it for AT&T; service.I got an unlocked one because I have AT&T.As; far as product and quaility this phone is a great buy for anyone on the go that needs to access e-mail,and other needed functions.

ProductInfo.Features:
Talk time: 5 hours
Battery Type: Removable Li-Ion Battery
Display Type: SXVGA
Expandable Memory
Weight (in ounces): 6.7
